软件包 com.taobao.datax.common.plugin

接口摘要
Line Represents one record of data which may be in database, HDFS, etc.
LineReceiver DataX use Storage to help Reader and Writer to exchange data, Writer uses LineReceiver to get data from Storage(Usually in memory).
LineSender DataX use Storage to help Reader and Writer to exchange data,s Reader use LineSender to put data into Storage.
Plugin Define basic methods which concrete plugins should implement.
PluginMonitor Monitor monitors Plugin status, record number of lines, failed number of lines, etc.
PluginParam PluginParam represents some key-value params defined in job xml for Plugin.
 

类摘要
MetaData MetaData records a source or sink Database meta information.
ParamsKey Constant params definition for PluginParam.
ParamsKey.HbaseWriter  
ParamsKey.HdfsReader  
ParamsKey.HdfsWriter  
ParamsKey.HttpReader  
ParamsKey.MysqlReader  
ParamsKey.MysqlWriter  
ParamsKey.OracleReader  
ParamsKey.OracleWriter  
ParamsKey.PanguWriter  
ParamsKey.SqlServerReader  
ParamsKey.StreamReader  
ParamsKey.StreamWriter  
PluginConst Some constants definition for Plugin.
Reader Reader represents a kind of Plugin to load data from source into DataX, such as mysql, hdfs.
Splitter Split DataX job into sub-jobs.
Writer A kind of Plugin which dump data to data destination(e.g mysql, HDFS).
 

枚举摘要
PluginStatus State of Plugin.
